parameters.query: =SELECT id as project_id, project_name, main_keyword, status FROM keyword_projects WHERE {{ $json.isUuid ? "uuid = '" + $json.projectId + "'" : "id = " + $json.projectId }}

=SELECT 
  kr.id,
  kr.keyword,
  kr.keyword_type,
  kr.search_volume,
  kr.keyword_difficulty,
  kr.cpc,
  kr.competition,
  kr.search_intent,
  kr.trend_direction,
  kr.parent_topic,
  kr.keyword_cluster,
  kr.opportunity_score,
  kr.source,
  kr.created_at
FROM keyword_results kr
WHERE kr.project_id = {{ $json.projectId }}
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN kr.opportunity_score IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  kr.opportunity_score DESC,
  kr.search_volume DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.limit }}
OFFSET {{ $json.offset }}

=SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_count,
  COALESCE(AVG(search_volume), 0) as avg_volume,
  COALESCE(AVG(keyword_difficulty), 0) as avg_difficulty,
  COALESCE(AVG(opportunity_score), 0) as avg_opportunity,
  SUM(CASE WHEN search_intent IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_intent
FROM keyword_results 
WHERE project_id = {{ $('IF - Project Exists').item.json.projectId }}
